meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Detention of Art Protested The Austrian government protested the detention in New York of two Egon Schiele paintings said to have been seized by the Nazis. Page B2.
Planet Sets Record High Working with a global warming trend, the waters of El Nino lifted the planet's average surface temperature to a record level. Page A12.
Detention of Art Protested The Austrian government protested the detention in New York of two Egon Schiele paintings said to have been seized by the Nazis. Page B2.
Planet Sets Record High Working with a global warming trend, the waters of El Nino lifted the planet's average surface temperature to a record level. Page A12.
Plugging an Electrical Leak The electronics industry agreed to reduce the power consumed by television sets that are not on, a small amount that adds up. Page A12.
Giants' Builder Moves On George Young, whose teams won two Super Bowls in his 19 years as general manager, left to join the N.F.L. front office. Page C1.
